title: Strengthening Practical Competencies in Business Strategy: Library Resource Utilization Strategies for Foreign Language Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can search foreign language learning materials (e-books, academic databases) via library online systems with 90% accuracy
Learners can derive one research topic using foreign language academic materials in VR simulation environments
Learners independently perform 100% of foreign language material borrowing/reservation processes through smartphone-based library apps

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
